properties.areaDesc: Waters from Point Pinos to Point Piedras Blancas 10-60 NM
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued January 14 at 3:37AM PST until January 16 at 9:00AM PST by NWS San Francisco CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, north winds 10 to 20 kt
with gusts up to 25 kt and seas 9 to 10 feet at 14 seconds
expected. For the Gale Watch, south winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts
up to 40 kt and seas 8 to 10 feet at 13 seconds possible.

* WHERE...Waters from Point Pinos to Point Piedras Blancas 10-
60 NM.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, from noon today to 9 PM
PST this evening. For the Gale Watch, from late Wednesday
night through Thursday morning.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 9 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING
